Text: Please and seed for others when the torrent is finish, thx.
Thanx! Been looking for this for a long time!
Gua-no: I did'nt have any idea people would download alternative music from 4AD records. Now I can see I was wrong! Thats why I upload lot of music from 4AD records :-)
Great upload and a band too few are aware of! Ladykillers are one of the best songs I know of! Thanks! :)
Thx. I have just right now upload The Brreders (4AD)
Thank you Kefissos for your great uploads! You don´t happen to have The Telescopes? That´s another band from the shoegaze-era that didn´t get the attention they deserved...
Resurrection: I do have The Telescope, but you have to wait for a while. I have other music to upload...;-)
I have already deleted an upload of the band Lush...sorry Guys, its your own fault, if you can't seed.

Oh man.  Somebody please seed this?  All my shoegaze stuff got stolen back in 1998.  Kefissos, I seeded your Slodive torrent to a ratio of 39.55 and your Belly torrent to over 9.  Throwing muses, over 7.

Kefissos.  Right here, in this moment, I'll have to profess my love for you; for your diligence (because i know this is somewhat difficult work and often thankless), for your selflessness (your ability to share a collection that has more than likely taken you quite some time to amass).  

I'm forever grateful...i'd even go so far as to kiss you were you not a bloody ocean away!  Oh, and trust that i'll seed!

@ phineasEnRetard 

Thanks for your kind words ;-)
Thanks a lot again Kefissos. I'm also downloading your UL of this magnificent band's radio and live sessions. Much appreciated!
thank you very much! mp3 192 kbps! =D
